notes: Only reacts on attack damage. Other sources of damage are ignored.
The returned damage is always dealt right after the incoming damage.
The damage is flagged as HP Removal, so it does not trigger any on-damage effects.
The damage has the no-reflection flag, preventing its damage from interacting with other sources of damage with the same flag.
The returned damage is affected by damage block.
Returned damage cannot be amplified with outgoing spell damage amplification and cannot spell lifesteal. Can be amplified by incoming spell damage amplification.
Can be amplified by incoming spell damage amplification.
Does not work against wards, buildings and allied units.
abilities.description: Everytime you are attacked, you return 28 damage to heroes and 17 damage to creeps.

name: Chipped Vest
description: It doesn't look like much, but it's oddly comfy.
